title: the great tilde.team migration 2: electric boogaloo
author: ~khuxkm
content:
tilde.team is now on an even beeeeefier vps! 4cores, 64gb ram, and 480gb ssd space! just like last time, everything is where you left it, but you will get a scary notice about a man-in-the-middle attack when you connect over ssh. (this is just because the IP address changed). the new IP is 209.18.47.61 and the ECDSA fingerprint is: 
SHA256:R3qNfKIF3IiXhKCbFX6rCKl73yzexi9Wodsow6XFres
for your verification purposes.
